faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Find quick answers to common questions about our services and consultations.

faqs.question: How do I schedule a consultation?
faqs.answer: You can schedule a consultation by filling out our contact form, calling us directly, or sending us an email. Our team will get back to you promptly to arrange a convenient time.

faqs.question: Are consultations free?
faqs.answer: Yes, initial consultations are completely free of charge. We believe in providing you with all the information you need to make an informed decision without any obligation.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual consultation?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer virtual consultations via video call for patients who cannot visit our clinic in person. This is a convenient way to discuss your concerns and get personalized advice.

faqs.question: What information should I prepare for my consultation?
faqs.answer: It's helpful to have information about your medical history, any medications you're taking, and photos of your hair/scalp condition if applicable. For in-person consultations, no special preparation is needed.
